title: (x) Accredited member - Friz Quadrata {Norbert}

comments.content:
I’d say it was [Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123010921/http:/www.fontpool.com/search/friz+quadrata/page1.html) Fuzzy!
